bibl.title: Note from [Philip Showalter Hench?] to [Dorma V.] Schnurr, [19--]

div1.p: [Hench?] instructs Schnurr in typing a document for him.

div1.head: Note from [Philip Showalter Hench?] to [Dorma V.] Schnurr, [19--]
div1.p:
Miss Schnurr
1) Please type as you would a letter - is that
single space?
2) Make as many onion skin copies as are
readable
3) Please type as far as possible on the left side
of the page - the number I have before each paragraph
Type the number on the margin not right next to the
opening word of the corresponding paragraph.
I want these numbers so I can get further information
for several people about data in
paragraph so & so.
4) Note to insert p 10 on p 9 before ¶ 27
you can follow the sequence by noting the
paragraph numbers
5) Don't sort out the pages types. There may be some corrections in spelling etc to type in.
